Ugu dambayn, tani waxay horseedi doontaa kalsooni dheeraad ah oo lagu qabo ZooCash.

Decentralized-gareynta ZooCash waxay sidoo kale yareyn kartaa kharashaadka ku baxa Amazoo si ay u maamusho lacagta (maadaama dadka isticmaala ay qayb ka noqon karaan hawsha dayactirka), laakiin maadaama Amazoo ay u badan tahay in ay weli rabto in ay si gaar ah ula socoto habka blockchain-ku u shaqeeyo, ma noqon doonto mid gebi ahaanba ka caawinaysa hoos u dhigista kharashaadka.

Sidoo kale, ma jirin wax faa’iido xagga xawaaraha ah oo ka imanaya; ZooCash markii uu ahaa nidaam dhexe wuxuu hore u si fiican ugu shaqaynayay macaamil degdeg ah.

fields.which:
Qaab aan xarun dhexe lahayn, shaqada lagu hayo kaydka xisaabaadka ee blockchain-ka laguna xaqiijinayo saxnaanta xogta waxaa si siman ugu qeybsanaya shabakad ka kooban dad badan oo wada shaqaynaya, kuwaas oo isgaarsiinaya si joogto ah. Kombiyuutar kasta oo ka qeybqaata shabakaddan waxaa lagu magacaabaa "node" xubin shabakad.

La soco in aad weli isticmaali karto ZooCash adigoon wadin qodob(node). Halka qodob-ku ay gacan ka geystaan ilaalinta blockchain-ka oo dhan, si aad u isticmaasho ZooCash waxaad u baahan tahay oo kaliya in aad la socoto xogta si gaar ah ula xiriirta akoonkaaga.
fields.question_text: Maxay tahay awoodda uu kombiyuutarkaagu u baahnaan lahaa haddii aad rabto inaad waddo xubin shabakadeed (node) oo ZooCash ah oo aad ka caawiso shabakadda ilaalinta kaydka xisaabaadka ZooCash?

options.text: Xiriir internet ah.
Meel kaydin ah oo ku filan si aad u kaydiso nuqulka blockchain-ka.
Awoodda lagu qaban karo hawlaha sirta ah sida dadweyne(), xaqiijin(), iwm.
Dhammaan waxa kor ku xusan.

correct_answer.text: Dhammaan waxa kor ku xusan.

fields.explanation:
Shabakadda ZooCash waxay u baahan tahay in nuqullo ka mid ah diiwaanka blockchain-ka la haysto, la ilaaliyo (tusaale ahaan, in lagu daro blocks cusub marka la daabaco), isla markaana la hubiyo in blocks-ku yihiin kuwo sax ah. Sidaas darteed, kombiyuutarkaaga uma baahna awoodo aad u badan si uu u noqdo ZooCash node, laakiin wuxuu u baahan yahay dhowr shay:

Xiriir internet ah si uu ula xiriiri karo nodes kale ee ZooCash una cusbooneysiiyo diiwaanka blockchain-ka marka blocks cusub la daabaco,

Meel keydin oo ku filan si uu u kaydiyo nuqulka diiwaanka blockchain-ka, si aad u haysato version maxalli ah oo aad ilaaliso. Waxaa laga yaabaa inaadan u baahnayn inaad kaydiso dhammaan xogta xisaabaadka iyo macaamilada, laakiin waxaa fiicnaan lahayd inaad haysato xog ku filan oo xisaabaadka/macaamilada ah si aad u xaqiijiso in macaamilada cusub aysan ahayn kuwa lacag laba jeer la bixinayo (double-spend),

Awood uu ku fuliyo hawlaha sirta ah (cryptographic) si uu u hubiyo in macaamilada la daabacay ay sax yihiin iyo inuu u hash gareeyo blocks si loo xaqiijiyo in hash pointer-koodu sax yahay.

Haddii midkood ka mid ah waxyaabahaas uu ka maqnaado, node-kaagu ma noqonayo mid waxtar u leh shabakadda ZooCash.

fields.which: Haddii loo qaato in aad adigu tahay qofka markan leh fursadda in uu ku daro xirmo cusub silsiladda (blockchain-ka), waxaad ogaan kartaa in aad isku dayi karto in aad si dhuumaaleysi ah ugu darto macaamil laba jeer lacag bixin ah (double-spend) xirmada aad soo jeedinayso — adigoo ku dhex qarinaya macaamillada saxda ah ee shabakadda lagu baahiyay.
fields.question_text: Marka la eego xeerarkii aan hore u dejinnay, kee ka mid ah cawaaqibyada soo socda ayaa dhici lahaa haddii dadka kale ay gartaan in xirmada aad soo jeedisay aysan sax ahayn?

options.text: xirmadaada lama aqbali doono.
marka xigta ee aad yeelan lahayd fursad aad ku soo jeediso block waa la dhaafi doonaa.
waxaa lagaa ganaaxi doonaa Zɇ.
waxaa lagaa mamnuuci doonaa isticmaalka ZooCash mustaqbalka.

correct_answer.text: xirmadaada lama aqbali doono.

fields.explanation:
Haddii dadka kale si sax ah u gartaan in blok-kaaga uu khaldan yahay (taas oo aan rajaynayno inay dhacdo si daacadnimada ZooCash loo ilaaliyo), markaas way diidi karaan inay ku daraan blok-kaaga nuqulka ay haystaan ee blockchain-ka, waxaana dhici doonta in nooca lagu heshiiyey ee blockchain-ka uusan ka mid noqon blok-kaaga.

Xeerarkii aan ilaa hadda dejinnay ma aysan darin ciqaabo kale (sida ganaax ama mamnuucid), sidaas darteed lama hirgelin doono wax ciqaab ah oo ka baxsan in blok-kaaga la diido.

fields.which: Horey, Amazoo ayaa xakameyn jiray wicitaanka createCash() oo iyaga kaliya ayaa saxiixi kara hawshaas, laakiin haddii aan isku dayeyno inaan ZooCash ka dhigno mid baahsan oo aan lahayn hal maamul (decentralize), ma sii wadi karno inaan sifo ahaan sidan u reebno — taasi waxay siinaysaa Amazoo awood buuxda oo ay ku xakameeyaan lacagta.
fields.question_text: Sidee baan u beddeli lahayn createCash() si aan ugu dhiirrigelino ilaalinta daacadnimada ee blockchain-ka?

options.text: U oggolow qof kasta inuu saxiixo createCash().
U oggolow qof kasta oo block ku daray silsiladda (blockchain) inuu saxiixi karo createCash().
U oggolow qoraha block-ga inuu hal mar isticmaalo wicitaanka createCash() si uu isagu u helo abaalmarin gudaha block walba.

correct_answer.text: U oggolow qoraha block-ga inuu hal mar isticmaalo wicitaanka createCash() si uu isagu u helo abaalmarin gudaha block walba.

fields.explanation:
Tallaabada 1:

Haddii la oggolaado in qof kasta uu saxiixi karo wicitaannada createCash(), taasi ma dhiirrigelinayso dayactirka daacadnimada blockchain-ka. Sababta ayaa ah in qof kastaa uu u diri karo ZooCash akoonkiisa isaga oo aan wax block sax ah gelin—wuxuu si fudud u baahin lahaa wicitaannada createCash() si dad kale u daabacaan. Haddii dadka kale iska indhatiraan, taasna waxay ka dhigaysaa in aysan dayactir daacad ah samaynayn.

Haddii qof kastaa uu isticmaali karo createCash() kaddib marka uu hal block sax ah geliyo, taasi wax badan ma hagaajinayso — maxaa yeelay mar haddii uu hal mar abaalmarin helay, uma baahna inuu sii wado gelinta blocks cusub oo sax ah.

Laakiin, haddii qoraaga block-ga la siiyo fursad kaliya oo uu hal mar ku isticmaalo createCash() gudaha block-ga uu qoray — si uu naftiisa abaalmarin ugu sameeyo — taasi waxay dadka ku dhiirrigelinaysaa in ay daacad noqdaan. Haddii aad heli karto ZooCash kaliya marka block-gaaga la aqbalo, waxaad dooneysaa inaad hubiso in block-gaasi sax yahay si wicitaanka createCash() ee abaalmarinta la aqbalo oo uusan lunto.







Tallaabada 2
Abuuridda ZooCash ee aan laga qaadin meel kale ma yaraynaysaa qiimaheeda?

Wax laga yaabo inuu kaa caraysiiyo ayaa ah sida nidaamkan u shaqeeyo. Labadii kiis ee hore, waxay ahayd mid iska cad in qiimaha ZooCash si dhaqso ah loo wiiqi lahaa haddii qof walba iska siin karo intuu doono ZooCash. Laakiin haddii aan xaddidno wicitaanka createCash() hal jeer block-kiiba (oo xitaa lagu daray qaddar cayiman), taasi si toos ah uma noqonayso ficil qiimo-dilid ah.

Inkasta oo ZooCash cusub uu ku soo kordhayo nidaamka block kasta oo la daabaco, qiimaha lacagta dhabta ah wuxuu ka yimaadaa kalsoonida dadka kale ay ku qabaan in la aqbali doono. Marka la eego xaaladdan, qiimaha ZooCash-ka la helay iyada oo loo marayo createCash() wuxuu ku dhisan yahay aaminaadda dadku ku qabaan nidaamkan.

fields.which: Horey, Amazoo ayaa xakameyn jiray wicitaanka createCash() oo iyaga kaliya ayaa saxiixi kara hawshaas, laakiin haddii aan isku dayeyno inaan ZooCash ka dhigno mid baahsan oo aan lahayn hal maamul (decentralize), ma sii wadi karno inaan sifo ahaan sidan u reebno — taasi waxay siinaysaa Amazoo awood buuxda oo ay ku xakameeyaan lacagta.

fields.which:
Haddii soo jeedinta xiga ee baloogga ay la socoto abaal-marin, markaa su’aasha ah sida saxda ah ee loo go'aaminayo qofka helaya fursadda inuu soo jeediyo baloogga xiga waxay noqonaysaa mid aad muhiim u ah.

Dhab ahaantii, ma sahlana in la siiyo amar ama kala horayn iyadoo lagu saleynayo cidda wadata xubinnimada shabakad, maadaama xubnaha shabakadda aysan lahayn aqoonsiyo gaar ah oo lagu aqoonsan karo gudaha blockchain-ka ZooCash. Furayaasha dadweynaha (public keys) ayaa ah aqoonsiyada kaliya ee ZooCash, mana laha xiriir toos ah oo hal-ku-hal ah oo lala yeesho xubnaha shabakadda.
fields.question_text: Waa maxay nidaamka aan u adeegsan karno doorashada qofka soo jeedinaya block-ka xiga si blockchain-ka loo sii wado, iyadoo ay adkaaneyso in qof keli ah uu xukumo block walba oo lagu daro silsiladda?

options.text: Block kasta wuxuu qeexayaa furaha dadweynaha (public key) ee heli doona fursadda soo jeedinta block-ka xiga.
Qofka haysta furaha dadweynaha ee soo socda (mid kasta oo isdaba-joog ah) ayaa helaya fursadda inuu soo jeediyo block-ka xiga.
Waxaa jira tartan go'an (sida tartanka orodka) oo lagu go'aamiyo qofka heli doona fursadda inuu soo jeediyo block-ka xiga.
Waxaa jira tartan ay ku jirto nasiib (sida ciyaarta poker-ka) oo lagu go'aamiyo qofka heli doona fursadda inuu soo jeediyo block-ka xiga.

correct_answer.text: Waxaa jira tartan ay ku jirto nasiib (sida ciyaarta poker-ka) oo lagu go'aamiyo qofka heli doona fursadda inuu soo jeediyo block-ka xiga.

fields.explanation:
Tallaabada 1
Haddii block kastaa uu si toos ah u cayimo furaha dadweynaha ee xiga (public key) ee heli doona fursadda inuu soo jeediyo block-ka xiga, way fududaan lahayd in hal qof uu si buuxda u xakameeyo dhammaan blockchain-ka — mar walbana wuxuu dooran lahaa mid ka mid ah akoonnadiisa si uu u noqdo soo jeediyaha block-ka xiga.

Haddii block-yadu loo kala hormarin lahaa iyadoo la raacayo furayaal dadweyne oo taxane ah, blockchain-ku marnaba lama sii wadi lahaa. Sababtu waa: si shaqada public() ay u ahaato mid ka difaac ah isku dhac (collision-resistant), waa in ay noqotaa wax aan suurtagal ahayn in qof uu helo furaha dadweynaha ee xiga.







Tallaabada 2
Haddii tartan go'aan qaadashadiisu tahay mid go'an lagu isticmaalo in lagu doorto qofka soo jeedinaya block-ka xiga, markaas qofka ugu fiican tartankaas ayaa ku guuleysan doona mar kasta. Tartanada noocaas ah kuma filna isbeddel si loo xaqiijiyo in hal qof uusan gacanta ku dhigin inta badan block-yada lagu daro blockchain-ka.

Laakiin haddii tartanku ku saleysan yahay nasiib iyo kala duwanaansho (randomness), markaa block-yada cusub way lagu dari karaa, waxaana adkaan doonta in qof keliya uu xakameeyo inta badan block-yada lagu darayo silsiladda.

Ogow in, xitaa marka tartanku yahay mid ku saleysan randomness, aysan gebi ahaanba suurtagal noqon in laga hortago hal qof oo xakameeya blockchain-ka, balse habkaas wuxuu abuurayaa caqabad aad uga weyn nidaamyada kale ee halkan lagu soo bandhigay.

Casharka xiga, waxaan si qoto dheer u eegi doonaa sida ay u adkaan lahayd in hal qof ama koox uu xakameeyo blockchain-ka marka tartan gaar ah loo adeegsado sidii nidaamka soo jeedinta block-yada.

fields.which:
Tusaale ahaan, halxiraale hash ah oo aad u sahlan wuxuu noqonayaa in la helo wax gelin (input) keenta in bits-ka ugu horreeya ee natiijada hash-ku noqdaan 0. Maadaama bit-kaasi uu kaliya qaadan karo qiimaha 0 ama 1, celcelis ahaan waxaad u baahnaan lahayd inaad isku daydo 2 gelin si aad u hesho xalka.

Halxiraale hash ah oo ka adag wuxuu noqonayaa in la helo wax gelin keenta in shanta bit ee ugu horreeya ee natiijada hash-ku noqdaan 0. Tartankan waxaan ku dari karnaa blockchain-ka ZooCash adigoo kusoo roga shardi ah in blocks-ka saxda ah ay xaliyaan halxiraalahan hash-ka — si kale haddii loo dhigo, hash-ka block-ku waa inuu ka bilaabmaa 00000 si uu u noqdo mid sax ah.
fields.question_text: Iyada oo la adeegsanayo xeelad mala-awaal ah oo ugu fiican, celcelis ahaan immisa isku day ayaa loo baahan doonaa si loo helo xalka halxiraalahan hash-ka?
fields.explanation:
Marka la adeegsanayo hawlgalka hash-ka oo adkeysi u leh isku-dhacyo (collision-resistant), ma jirto xeelad ka wanaagsan qiyaas aan kala sooc lahayn si loo helo natiijo gaar ah.
Haddii aan ku qiyaasno gelinno aan kala soocnayn (random inputs) annagoo rajeynayna natiijooyin aan kala soocnayn, fursadda in qayb (bit) kasta oo gaar ahi noqoto 0 waa ½ (maadaama ay u dhaxayn karto 0 ama 1 si siman).
Fursadda in shanta bit ee ugu horreeya ay noqdaan 0 waa:
½ × ½ × ½ × ½ × ½ = (½)^5 = 1⁄32
Tani waxay leedahay fursad ah 1 meel kasta oo 32 ah, markaa celcelis ahaan waxaan filaynaa inay qaadato 32 isku day si aan u helno gelin keenta natiijo ka bilaabata 00000, taasoo xallinaysa halxiraalaha hash-ka.

fields.which:
Halxiraale hash ah wuxuu noqon lahaa in la helo baloog marka la hash-gareeyo uu ku bilaabanayo xarafyada SHOPAMAZOO! iyadoo la adeegsanayo habkan 3-bit koodh-u-beddel ah.

Tani waxay la micno tahay in 3-da bit ee ugu horreeya ay noqdaan 000, taasoo u dhiganta xarafka S, 3-da bit ee xigana ay u dhigmaan H, kadib O, P, A, M, A, Z, O, O, ugu dambeyn !.

Marka, 33 bits (saddex bit oo xaraf kasta ah × 11 xaraf ee ku jira SHOPAMAZOO!) waa inay yeeshaan qiimo gaar ah si loogu aqoonsado in balooggu uu xaliyay halxiraalaha hash-ka.
fields.question_text: Waa maxay suurtagalnimada (fursadda) in baloog gaar ah uu xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka?

options.text: 1 / 8³³

fields.explanation:
Marka la isticmaalayo howlaha hash-ka ee iska caabinta isku dhaca, fursadda in mid kasta oo ka mid ah bit-yada wax soo saarka uu noqdo qiimo gaar ah (tusaale ahaan 0 ama 1) waa ½. Sidaas darteed, fursadda in silsilad ka kooban n bits ay noqoto qiimo gaar ah waxay noqonaysaa 1 / 2ⁿ.

Maadaama SHOPAMAZOO! uu u dhigmaayo 33 bits marka la isticmaalayo habkan 3-bit ee lagu matalo xaraf kasta, suurtagalnimada in baloog gaar ah uu xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka waa:

1 / 2³³.

fields.which:
Halxiraale hash ah wuxuu noqon lahaa in la helo baloog marka la hash-gareeyo uu ku bilaabanayo xarafyada SHOPAMAZOO! iyadoo la adeegsanayo habkan 3-bit koodh-u-beddel ah.

Tani waxay la micno tahay in 3-da bit ee ugu horreeya ay noqdaan 000, taasoo u dhiganta xarafka S, 3-da bit ee xigana ay u dhigmaan H, kadib O, P, A, M, A, Z, O, O, ugu dambeyn !.

Marka, 33 bits (saddex bit oo xaraf kasta ah × 11 xaraf ee ku jira SHOPAMAZOO!) waa inay yeeshaan qiimo gaar ah si loogu aqoonsado in balooggu uu xaliyay halxiraalaha hash-ka.
fields.question_text: Waa maxay suurtagalnimada (fursadda) in baloog gaar ah uu xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka?

options.text: 1 / 8³³

fields.explanation:
Marka la isticmaalayo howlaha hash-ka ee iska caabinta isku dhaca, fursadda in mid kasta oo ka mid ah bit-yada wax soo saarka uu noqdo qiimo gaar ah (tusaale ahaan 0 ama 1) waa ½. Sidaas darteed, fursadda in silsilad ka kooban n bits ay noqoto qiimo gaar ah waxay noqonaysaa 1 / 2ⁿ.

Maadaama SHOPAMAZOO! uu u dhigmaayo 33 bits marka la isticmaalayo habkan 3-bit ee lagu matalo xaraf kasta, suurtagalnimada in baloog gaar ah uu xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka waa:

1 / 2³³.

fields.which:
Waa kan sida aan u hirgelin karno halxiraalaha hash-ka ee SHOPAMAZOO! si loogu adeegsado tartanka go’aamiya cidda xaqa u leh inay soo jeediso baloogga xiga. Qof walba waa loo oggol yahay inuu soo jeediyo baloog, laakiin waxa kaliya oo uu noqonayaa mid ansax ah haddii uu buuxiyo shuruudahan soo socda:

Wuxuu leeyahay hash pointer (tilmaame hash) oo u tixraacaya balooggii hore,

Wuxuu ka kooban yahay hal wicitaan createCash() ah oo xadidan oo lacag Z¢ ah lagu abuurayo,

Wuxuu ka kooban yahay oo keliya xawaalado sax ah (kuwa si sax ah loo saxiixay, lana hubiyay in aysan jirin bixinta lacag laba jeer),

Wuxuuna xallinayaa halxiraalaha hash-ka SHOPAMAZOO! — taasoo micnaheedu yahay in bilowga hash-ka baloogga uu u dhigmaayo xarafyada SHOPAMAZOO! marka la isticmaalayo habka 3-bit ee wax lagu matalo.
fields.question_text: Waxaad isku dayaysaa inaad baloog ku darto blockchain-ka ZooCash si aad u hesho abaalmarinta baloogga xiga, sidaas darteed waxaad rabtaa inaad hesho baloog ansax ah ka hor qof kasta oo kale. Haddii aad soo ururiso baloog, balse uusan xallin halxiraalaha hash-ka SHOPAMAZOO!, maxaad tahay inaad sameyso?

options.text: Daabac baloogga xitaa haddii uu ansax yahay.
Baloogga wax ka beddel oo eeg inuu xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka.
Xisaabi furayaal dadweyne cusub oo u dir createCash() furahaas cusub.
Sug inta silsiladda block-yada la kordhinayo kadibna mar kale isku day.

correct_answer.text: Baloogga wax ka beddel oo eeg inuu xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka.

fields.explanation:
Tallaabada 1
Haddii aad rabto inaad hesho block xalliya halxiraalaha hash-ka (hash puzzle), waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad si degdeg ah u tijaabiso block-yo badan. Habka ugu fudud ee tan lagu sameeyo waa in si yar wax looga beddelo block-ka kadibna dib loo hash-gareeyo, iyadoo la celinayo ilaa aad ku guulaysato.

Tani waxaa lagu xalliyey lacagaha dhabta ah ee loo adeegsado cryptocurrency-ga adigoo ka tagaya meel bannaan oo ka mid ah block-ka halkaas oo qoraaga block-ku gelin karo wax kasta oo uu doono (si uu si fudud oo dhakhso leh wax ugu beddeli karo).

Haddii aad samayso furaha dadweynaha (public key) cusub si aad markale u tijaabiso in aad block-ka hash-gareyso, waxay si weyn kuu gaabinaysaa, maxaa yeelay waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad abuurto furaha qarsoon (private key), xisaabiso furaha dadweynaha ee la jaan qaadaya, kadibna hash-gareyso block-ka markasta oo aad tijaabinayso. Haddii aad adeegsato habka sare ku xusan, waxaad iska dhaafi kartaa tallaabooyinka aad furayaal cusub ku samayn lahayd.




Tallaabada 2
Haddii aad sugeyso inta silsiladda block-yada (blockchain) la kordhiyo ka hor intaadan mar kale isku dayin, waxaad hal jeer kaliya isku dayaysaa in aad hesho block sax ah block kasta. Maaddaama hal block uu leeyahay fursad dhan 1/2³³ oo uu ku xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka (hash puzzle), waxaa aad u badan in aadan waligaa helin block xalliya halxiraalahaas
(haddii aan silsiladda block-yadu noqonin ilaa heer ay gaarto qiyaastii 2³³ blockyo).

Ugu dambayn, haddii aad isku daydo inaad daabacdo (publish) block aan xallin halxiraalaha hash-ka, waxaa si fudud u diidi doona dhammaan xubnaha maamulka faracyada (node-yada) kale, mana heli doontid abaalmarinta block-ka.

fields.which:
Waa kan sida aan u hirgelin karno halxiraalaha hash-ka ee SHOPAMAZOO! si loogu adeegsado tartanka go’aamiya cidda xaqa u leh inay soo jeediso baloogga xiga. Qof walba waa loo oggol yahay inuu soo jeediyo baloog, laakiin waxa kaliya oo uu noqonayaa mid ansax ah haddii uu buuxiyo shuruudahan soo socda:

Wuxuu leeyahay hash pointer (tilmaame hash) oo u tixraacaya balooggii hore,

Wuxuu ka kooban yahay hal wicitaan createCash() ah oo xadidan oo lacag Z¢ ah lagu abuurayo,

Wuxuu ka kooban yahay oo keliya xawaalado sax ah (kuwa si sax ah loo saxiixay, lana hubiyay in aysan jirin bixinta lacag laba jeer),

fields.which: Macdanlaydu waxay si degdeg ah u xisaabin karaan tiro badan oo hashyo kala duwan ah oo ku saabsan blocks leh isla heshiisyada, haddii aan ka tagno meel bannaan oo block-ga ah oo lagu gelin karo xarfo aan kala soocnayn .
fields.question_text: Haddii ay jiraan macdaneeyaal badan oo mid walba raba inuu block-giisa ku daro blockchain-ka isagoo xallinaya halxiraalaha hash-ka ee SHOPAMAZOO!, kee ayaa ugu dhow inuu noqdo midka ugu horreeya ee ku guuleysta ku daridda block-ka xiga?

options.text: Macdanaha (miner-ka) wata tirada ugu badan ee xudduudaha (nodes) ayaa ah ka ugu badan fursadda inuu noqdo midka ku guuleysta ku daridda block-ga xiga.
Macdanaha leh awoodda hash-ka ee ugu badan ayaa la hubaa inuu ku darayo block-ga xiga.
Macdanaha leh awoodda hash-ka ee ugu badan ayaa ah kan ugu suurtogalka badan inuu ku daro block-ga xiga, balse lama hubo.
Dhammaan macdanayaasha waxay fursad siman u leeyihiin inay ku daraan block-ga xiga, maadaama natiijooyinka hash-ku ay asal ahaan yihiin kuwo kala sooc la’aan ah.

correct_answer.text: Macdanaha leh awoodda hash-ka ee ugu badan ayaa ah kan ugu suurtogalka badan inuu ku daro block-ga xiga, balse lama hubo.

fields.explanation:
Macdaneeye kasta oo isku dayaya block gaar ah wuxuu leeyahay fursad ah 1/2⁽³³⁾ si uu u xalliyo halxiraalaha hash-ka. Macdaneeye leh awood hash badan wuxuu awoodaa inuu sameeyo hash badan waqti gaaban gudaheed, taasoo siinaysa fursado dheeraad ah oo uu ku helo xalka 1-ka ah ee ka mid ah 2⁽³³⁾.

Fursadahan dheeraadka ah waxay ka dhigayaan macdaneeyaha leh awoodda hash-ka ugu badan midka ugu badan ee la filan karo inuu xalliyo halxiraalaha marka hore – laakiin arrintaasi lama hubo. Macdaneeye leh awood hash yar ayaa wali nasiib u yeelan kara inuu xalliyo marka hore, in kastoo uusan samayn hash badan sida kuwa kale.

fields.which: Nidaamkan wuxuu dhiirrigelinayaa kuwa macdanta qoda (miners) inay raadiyaan block-yo cusub, waxaana suuragal ah in haddii ZooCash caan noqoto, qodista macdanta (mining) ay noqoto mid si weyn loo xiiseeyo. Ugu dambeyntiina, qodista macdanta waxay noqon kartaa mid caan ah oo heerkeedu gaaro in block-yo cusub oo xalliya halxiraaha hash-ka ee SHOPAMAZOO! la helo daqiiqad kasta.
fields.question_text: Haddii aan rabno in block cusub lagu daro qiyaastii hal mar daqiiqaddii halkii uu ka ahaan lahaa hal mar ilbiriqsikii, isbeddel noocee ah ayaan sameyn karnaa si aan tan u gaarno anagoo aan niyad-jabinayn dadka macdanta qoda (miners)?

options.text: Sameynta halxiraaha hash-ka mid adag waa hab sax ah.
Yaree abaalmarinta qodista .
Kordhi tirada macaamilada loo oggol yahay in lagu daro baloog kasta.
Dhammaan kuwaas way shaqayn lahaayeen.

correct_answer.text: Sameynta halxiraaha hash-ka mid adag waa hab sax ah.

fields.explanation:
Tallaabada 1
Waxaan u dhimi karnaa xawaaraha lagu helayo blocks-ka cusub annaga oo aan niyad jabin macdanta (miners) adigoo adkeynaya halxiraalaha hash-ka. Waxaan sheegnay in block-ka ZooCash uu u baahan yahay inuu hash gareeyo si uu u bilaabo SHOPAMAZOO!, laakiin marka awoodda macdanta ay korodho, waxaa laga yaabaa inaan ka dhigno inuu ku bilaabmo SHOPAMAZOO!!!!, ugu dambeyntiina SHOPAMAZOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.

Waxaan dhisnaa heerka kala duwan ee dhibka (difficulty) oo la jaanqaadaya xeerarka ZooCash bilowgii, si hash puzzle-ku u adkaado ama u fududaado haddii macdanayaashu ay helayaan blocks cusub si deg deg ah ama si gaabis ah.

Kordhinta tirada macaamilka (transactions) ee la oggol yahay in lagu daro block kuma caawinayso xaaladdan. Haddii blocks cusub la daabacayo daqiiqad kasta, waxaa aad u yar fursadda ah in blocks-ka ay gaaraan xadka macaamillada. Xitaa haddii ay dhacdo, kordhinta yar ee xisaabinta loo baahan yahay si loo hash-gareeyo blocks-ka waaweyn wax yar bay ka tari doontaa hoos u dhigista heerka blocks-ka cusub lagu helayo.



Tallaabada 2
Yaraynta abaalmarinta macdanta (mining reward) waxay hoos u dhigi kartaa xawaaraha lagu helo blocks cusub, laakiin kaliya iyadoo laga niyad-jabiyo macdanayaashu inay sii wadaan macdanta. Maadaama macdanayaashu ay bixiyaan amniga blockchain-ka ZooCash, tani ma aha is-weydaarsi (trade-off) fiican.

Qaar ka mid ah lacagaha loo adeegsado dhabta ah (sida Bitcoin), abaalmarinta macdanta wuu yaraadaa waqti ka dib, laakiin looguma talagelin si loo hubiyo in blocks cusub la helo waqtiyo isku mid ah. Abaalmarinta macdanta ayaa hoos loo dhigayaa nidaamyadan si loo xakameeyo sicir-bararka. Lama filayo in macdanayaashu aad u niyad-jabaan markay abaalmarintu yaraaneyso, sababtoo ah waqti ka dib qayb weyn oo abaalmarintooda ah waxay ka imaan doontaa khidmadaha macaamilka (transaction fees).

fields.which: Nidaamkan wuxuu dhiirrigelinayaa kuwa macdanta qoda (miners) inay raadiyaan block-yo cusub, waxaana suuragal ah in haddii ZooCash caan noqoto, qodista macdanta (mining) ay noqoto mid si weyn loo xiiseeyo. Ugu dambeyntiina, qodista macdanta waxay noqon kartaa mid caan ah oo heerkeedu gaaro in block-yo cusub oo xalliya halxiraaha hash-ka ee SHOPAMAZOO! la helo daqiiqad kasta.

fields.which:
Dhibaato aad dareemi karto ayaa ah in inkastoo nidaamkani dhiirrigelin u yahay macdanlaydu inay helaan blocks, haddana ma jirto wax dhiirrigelin ah oo ku saabsan inay ku daraan macaamilo block-yadooda. Macdanaha sameeya block madhan wuxuu helayaa abaalmarin la mid ah midka sameeya block buuxa oo leh macaamilo badan.

Macdane wax ku ool ah oo danihiisa raacaya ayaa laga yaabaa inuusan isku dhibin inuu la socdo shabakadda si uu u arko macaamilo la baahinayo, wuxuuna diyaarsan karaa blocks uu ku jiro kaliya macaamilo aan micne lahayn oo u dhexeeya akoonnadiisa gaarka ah.
fields.question_text: Sidee ayaan ugu dhiirrigelin karnaa macdanayaal inay daabacaan macaamilo ay rabaan isticmaalayaasha dhabta ah ee ZooCash inay sameeyaan?

options.text: Block kasta waa laga rabaa inuu yeesho ugu yaraan tiro cayiman oo macaamilo ah.
Macaamil kasta waxa ku jira khidmad yar oo uu isticmaalehu bixiyo, taasoo u gudubta macdan sameeyaha.
Cabbirka abaalmarinta block-ga createCash() waxa lagu xiraa tirada macaamillada ku jira block-gaas.
Dhammaan xalalkan way shaqeyn lahaayeen.

correct_answer.text: Macaamil kasta waxa ku jira khidmad yar oo uu isticmaalehu bixiyo, taasoo u gudubta macdan sameeyaha.

fields.explanation:
Ku daridda khidmadaha macaamilka oo ay macdan-qodayaashu heli doonaan marka ay ku daraan macaamilka block-ga waxay dhiirrigelinaysaa inay ku daraan macaamillo dhab ah block-yadooda.

In la qasbo in block walba uu yeesho tiro ugu yar oo macaamillo ah ama in cabbirka abaalmarinta block-ga lagu xiro tirada macaamillada ku jirta block-gaasi maaha xal hubaal ah. Macdan-qode danihiisa gaarka ah wata wuxuu nidaamyadan khiyaami karaa isagoo buuxinaya block-yadiisa isagoo isticmaalaya macaamillo been abuur ah oo u dhaxeeya akoonyadiisa.

fields.which:
Taa beddelkeed, halkii uu ka qodi lahaa blocks si ay ula xiriiraan block-kii ugu dambeeyay, Manny wuxuu sameeyaa block sida caadiga ah — laakin halkii uu tusaalaha hash-ka ugu jeedin lahaa block-kii ugu dambeeyay,
wuxuu ku xiraa tusaale hash ah oo tilmaamaya block hore, ka hor inta uusan samaynin macaamilladii uu hadda ka shallaayay.

Ujeeddadiisu waa in uu abuuro nooc cusub oo blockchain ah oo aan lahayn macaamilkaas. Ugu dambeyn, wuxuu qodaa block cusub oo leh hash ku bilaabma:

SHOPAMAZOO!:
fields.question_text: Iyadoo la eegayo xeerarkii aan hore u dejinay ee ku saabsan blocks-ka ansaxda ah, ma jiraa wax ka dhigaya block-ga cusub ee cabdi mid aan ansax ahayn?

options.text: Haa, waxa uu ka kooban yahay macaamillo aan ansax ahayn.
Haa, ma laha tusaale hash ah (hash pointer) oo tilmaamaya block-kii hore.
Haa, ma xallinayo halxiraalaha hash-ka.
Maya, waxba kama jiraan block-ga cusub ee Cabdi oo ka dhigaya mid aan ansax ahayn.

correct_answer.text: Maya, waxba kama jiraan block-ga cusub ee Cabdi oo ka dhigaya mid aan ansax ahayn.

fields.explanation:
Marka la eego xeerarkii aan ilaa hadda dejinay, block-ga Cabdi si buuxda ayuu u ansax yahay:

Wuxuu leeyahay tusaale hash ah oo u tilmaamaya block-kii hore.

Wuxuu ka kooban yahay macaamillo sax ah oo kaliya.

Wuxuu xallinayaa halxiraalaha hash-ka.

Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad ka hor timaaddo oo sheegto in block-ga Cabdi uu ka kooban yahay macaamillo aan sax ahayn — oo uu mar labaad isticmaalayo ZooCash-kiisii. Laakiin, maadaama block-giisu uu ka farcamo blockchain-kii ka horreeyay markii uu markii hore isticmaalay ZooCash-kaas, tani ma noqonayso isticmaal laba jeer (double-spend).

Taabadalkeed, waxay u eg tahay taariikh kale oo kale. Laan kasta oo ka mid ah blockchain-ka, ZooCash-kiisa hal mar baa la isticmaalay.

fields.which:
Markii Cabdi abuuro laantiisa, labada silsiladoodba waa ansax marka laga eego in dhammaan xeerarka cryptography-ga la raacay, haddii aad kaliya eegto blocks-ka ku yaal hal waddo. Wuxuu u baahin karaa blockchain-kiisa shabakadda, waxaana mid kasta oo ka mid ah xubnaha shabakadda (nodes) ee fiiriya ay xaqiijin karaan in xeerarka blocks-ka ansaxda ah la raacay.

Si kastaba ha ahaatee, diwaanka ZooCash ma taageeri karo macaamillada labada dhinac isku mar, sidaas darteed marka laan (fork) dhacdo, bulshada ZooCash waa inay go'aansato laanta saxda ah. Haddii ay arkaan noocyo kala duwan oo blockchain ah lagu baahinayo shabakadda — sida laanta Cabdi iyo silsiladdii hore — waxay u baahan doonaan hab ay ku doortaan midda ay u aqoonsanayaan blockchain-ka dhabta ah ee ZooCash.
fields.question_text: Kee ka mid ah xeerarkan lagu doorto laanta ansaxda ah ayaa noqon lahaa kan ugu fiican ee ka hortagi kara in laanta Cabdi la raaco?

options.text: Marka laan (fork) dhacdo, mar walba raac block-ga uu hash-kiisu leeyahay inta ugu badan ee calaamadaha ! ah kadib SHOPAMAZOO.
Mar walba raac laanta leh block-ga ugu cusub.
Mar walba raac laanta ugu dheer.
Mar walba raac laanta leh noocyada ugu badan ee macdaneeyayaasha (qudaarta macdanta).

correct_answer.text: Mar walba raac laanta ugu dheer.

fields.explanation:
Tallaabada 1

Xeerka doorashada laanta ee si wanaagsan uga hortagi kara in laanta Cabdi la raaco waa: in mar walba la raaco laanta ugu dheer. Marka xeerkan la adeegsado, si laanta Cabdi loo raaco, wuxuu u baahan yahay inuu ka dhigo laantiisa mid ka dheer laanta asalka ah, taas oo u baahan doonta shaqo aad u badan — shaqo aanay u badnayn in Cabdi kaligiis ka bixi karo, maadaama inta kale ee shabakadda ay si joogto ah u sii kordhinayaan laanta ansaxda ah.

Raacista laanta leh hash ay ku xigaan tiro badan oo calaamado ah (!) kadib SHOPAMAZOO! ma ahan xeer doorasho oo wanaagsan, sababtoo ah haddii Cabdi doonayo in laantiisu noqoto midda la raaco, wuxuu waqti badan gelin karaa qodista hal block ilaa uu helo mid leh “!” fara badan, markaasna laantiisa si deg deg ah ayay u noqon lahayd tan ansaxda ah, taas oo baabi'in lahayd shaqadii badanayd ee macdaneeyeyaasha kale.







Tallaabada 2

Raacista laanta leh block-ga ugu cusub waxay noqon kartaa mid aad u dhibaato badan. Haddii macdaneeyeyaasha ay ku kala qaybsamaan laamo kala duwan, laanta ansaxda ah waxay marba dhinac u leexan doontaa marka macdane cusub helo block cusub (maadaama markasta uu noqonayo kan ugu cusub).

Raacista laanta leh macdaneeyayaal kala duwan oo tiro badan waxay marka hore u muuqan kartaa mid faa’iido leh, laakiin maadaama macdane kasta uu samaysan karo fureyaal dadweyne (public keys) cusub markasta oo uu doono (taasoo la micno ah aqoonsi cusub), si fudud ayaa xeerkan loogu khiyaani karaa.

Dhanka kale, maadaama aanan u adeegsanayn xeerkan si aan ugu dooranno laanta la raacayo, macdaneeyeyaashu waxaa laga yaabaa inaanay dhibsanin isticmaalka furayaasha dadweyne ee kala duwan. Haddii uu hal macdane helo inta badan blocks-ka laantaas, taasi waxay noqon kartaa tilmaan muujinaysa in wax khaldan ay jiraan — sida aan ku arki doono qaybaha dambe ee casharkan.

fields.which: Tusaale ahaan, haddii macaamilka uu Cabdi ka shallaayo uu ku jiro afaraad ee blocks-ka ugu dambeeya ee blockchain-ka — taasi micnaheedu waa 3 block oo cusub ayaa lagu daray kadib macaamilkaas.
fields.question_text: Haddii Cabdi rabo inuu abuuro laan cusub (fork) oo ka bilaabata ka hor macaamilkii uu ka shallaayay, waa imisa ugu yaraan halxiraalayaal hash uu u baahan yahay inuu xalliyo si laantiisa loogu aqoonsado inay tahay blockchain-ka saxda ah ee ZooCash?

options.text: Si kasta oo uu Cabdi u xalliyo halxiraalayaasha hash-ka, laantiisa lama aqbali doono.

fields.explanation:
Ugu yaraan, Cabdi wuxuu u baahan yahay inuu laantiisa ka dhigo mid la mid ah dhererka silsiladda hadda jirta si loo aqbalo. Waxa dhacaya marka labada laan ay isku dheeraan yihiin waxaan kaga hadli doonaa su'aalaha xiga.

Block-kii ugu dambeeyay ee uu Cabdi ka farcami karo waa midka si toos ah uga horreeya macaamilka uu ka shallaayay. Taasi waxay la micno tahay inuu u baahan yahay inuu xalliyo halxiraalaha hash ee block cusub oo barbar socda midka leh macaamilkaas, ka dibna
3 halxiraale hash oo dheeraad ah si uu ula simo saddexda block ee ku xigay macaamilkaas — taas oo wadarta ka dhigaysa 4 halxiraale hash oo uu xalliyo.

Dabcan, tani waa ugu yaraan intuu u baahan yahay. Haddii macdaneeyeyaasha kale ay sii kordhiyaan silsiladda weyn iyagoo ku daraya blocks cusub intuu Cabdi ku mashquulsan yahay xallinta, markaas wuxuu u baahan doonaa inuu helo blocks dheeraad ah sidoo kale.

fields.which:
Dib-u-noqoshada sharwadaha ah ee Cabdi ma aha sababta kaliya ee ay laan uga dhalan karto blockchain-ka.

Tusaale ahaan, ka soo qaad in laba macdane, Luul iyo Xafso, ay labaduba ka shaqeynayaan blockchain-ka ZooCash, kadibna Xafso hesho block oo hash-kiisu ku bilaabmo:

SHOPAMAZOO!.

In ka yar ilbiriqsiyo gudaheed — iyada oo aysan weli ogayn block-ga Xafso — Luul ayaa iyaduna hesha block oo hash-kiisu ku bilaabmo:

SHOPAMAZOO!!!:
fields.question_text: Marka la eego xeerkeenna ah in aan mar walba raacno laanta ugu dheer, yaa laantiisu noqonaysa midda ansaxda ah xaaladdan?

options.text: Xafso, maadaama ay iyadu heshay block-ga ugu horreeya.
Luul, maadaama hash-keedu leeyahay calaamado badan oo ! ah.
Midna midkoodna, maadaama labada laanba ay isku dheeraan yihiin.

correct_answer.text: Midna midkoodna, maadaama labada laanba ay isku dheeraan yihiin.

fields.explanation: Laamuhu waxay leeyihiin silsilado isla dherer ah, sidaas darteed marka la eego xeerarkii aan ilaa hadda dejinay, midna kama ansax badna kan kale.

fields.which:
Macdane kasta si gooni ah ayuu u dooran karaa laanta uu ka shaqeynayo, taasoo ugu dambayn kala soocaysa laanta noqonaysa tan weyn ee la raaco — iyada oo aan loo baahnayn faragelin gaar ah.

Ka soo qaad in laan sidan oo kale ah ay dhacdo, adiguna aad doorato inaad ka shaqeyso laanta Xafso, balse macdane kale uu helo block kordhinaya laanta Luul ka hor inta aan la kordhin laanta Xafso.
fields.question_text: Maxaad samayn lahayd?

options.text: Sii joog laanta Xafso.
U wareeg laanta Luul oo ka shaqee.
Jooji qodista wax yar si aad u aragto halka block-ka xiga laga helo.

correct_answer.text: U wareeg laanta Luul oo ka shaqee.

fields.explanation:
Maadaama laanta Luul la kordhiyay ka hor laanta Xafso, hadda laanta Luul ayaa noqotay laanta ugu dheer, waxaana dhammaan macdaneeyayaasha daacadda ah u arki doonaan midda saxda ah.
Tallaabada ugu fiican ee aad qaadi karto waa inaad u wareegto laanta Luul, sababtoo ah haddii aan qof kale si deg deg ah uga helin block kale laanta Xafso ka hor inta aan inta badan macdaneeyeyaasha aysan ogaan in laanta Luul ay dheer tahay, laanta Xafso waxay u badan tahay in la dayaco.

fields.which:
Waxay xor u yihiin inay ka raadiyaan blocks laanta ay doonaan, laakiin haddii ay helaan block ku jira laan gaaban, block-gaas waa la dayici doonaa haddii aanay laantaasi noqon laanta ugu dheer.

Xusuusnow, sababtoo ah laamaha dabiiciga ah ee sidan oo kale ah, block ansax ah looma hubo inuu galayo silsiladda weyn. Ka soo qaad inaad gudbiso macaamil shabakadda, kadibna uu ku dhaco block ansax ah —
Block723 ee blockchain-ka ZooCash.
fields.question_text: Waa maxay waxa dhici kara si macaamilkaaga uu ugu dambayn noqdo mid la dayaco?

options.text: Ma suurtagalayso in macaamilkaaga la dayaco maadaama Block723 uu yahay block ansax ah.
Laan (fork) ka bilaabanta ka hor Block723 ayaa noqota mid ka dheer silsiladda ay ku jirto Block723.
Laan kasta oo ka bilaabata ka hor Block723 ayaa dhici karta.
Block ansax ah oo aan wadin macaamilkaaga ayaa la daabacaa.

correct_answer.text: Laan (fork) ka bilaabanta ka hor Block723 ayaa noqota mid ka dheer silsiladda ay ku jirto Block723.

fields.explanation:
Markii Block723 lagu daabaco blockchain-ka ZooCash, macaamilkaaga oo ku jira block-gaas wuxuu ahaanayaa mid ansax ah ilaa iyo inta Block723 uu qayb ka yahay blockchain-ka la aqbalay, taasoo dhici doonta haddii uu weli ku jiro laanta ugu dheer.

Si macaamilkaaga loo dayaco, waxaa loo baahan yahay laan kale oo ka dheer tan uu Block723 ku jiro, taasoo aan ku jirin Block723. Tani waxay dhici kartaa haddii laan ka bilaabata ka hor Block723 ay noqoto mid ka dheer laanta uu ku jiro Block723.

Uma baahnid inaad ka welwesha laamo cusub oo ka bilaabma ka hor Block723, sababtoo ah inta laanta kale ay gaaban tahay, iyada ayaa la dayici doonaa.

Sidoo kale uma baahnid inaad ka baqdo blocks ansax ah oo aan macaamilkaaga ku jirin — blocks-ka cusub waxay qaadaan macaamillo cusub, sidaas darteed wax blocks ah oo yimaada ka dib Block723 ma qaadi karaan macaamilkaaga mar kale.

Sababtoo ah macaamilkaaga waa la dayici karaa haddii uu ku jiro block ku jira laan ka gaaban laanta weyn, waxaa caadi ahaan lagula taliyaa in la sugo ilaa dhowr block oo kale lagu daro kadib block-gaaga ka hor intaadan u aqoonsan macaamilka inuu yahay mid si buuxda loo xaqiijiyay.

Block kasta oo ansax ah oo lagu daro ka dib block-gaaga wuxuu si weyn u yareynayaa suurtagalnimada in laan kale oo cusub ay noqoto mid ka dheer.

fields.which:
Cabdi waa xubin ka tirsan Ururka Boqorrada Cryptography-ga (SoCK) wuxuuna u jeedsadaa xubnaha kooxda si ay uga wada shaqeeyaan sidii ay isticmaalka-labalaab (double-spend) ugu dari lahaayeen blockchain-ka ZooCash.

Wuxuu ku doodayaa in haddii ay awoodayaan inay sameeyaan laan cusub oo ka dheer silsiladdii asalka ahayd, ay taasi u ogolaanayso in ay si wax ku ool ah markale u isticmaalaan ZooCash (Z¢) ay hore ugu direen dadka kale sida uu muujinayo laantii hore.
fields.question_text: Maxay sabab u tahay in haddii dhammaan xubnaha SoCK ay la socdaan qorshaha Cabdi ay suuragalnimada guusha u sii badanayso?

options.text: SoCK waxay leedahay xubno (nodes) ka badan intuu Cabdi kaligiis leeyahay.
SoCK waxay leedahay labo-lammaane fure sir/fure dadweyne oo ka badan inta uu Cabdi kaligiis haysto.
SoCK waxay leedahay awood hash ka badan tan uu Cabdi kaligiis leeyahay.
SoCK waxay haysataa ZooCash ka badan inta uu Cabdi kaligiis haysto.
Midkoodna ma kordhinayo fursadda uu qorshuhu ku guuleysanayo.

correct_answer.text: SoCK waxay leedahay awood hash ka badan tan uu Cabdi kaligiis leeyahay.

fields.explanation:
Si qorshahan uu u guuleysto, Cabdi iyo SoCK waa inay dhisaan laan ka dheer silsiladda weyn, taasoo u baahan doonta xoog xisaabeed aad u weyn.

Maadaama SoCK ay haystaan awood xisaabeed ka badan tan uu Cabdi kaligiis haysto, qorshihiisu wuxuu yeelanayaa fursad guul oo ka weyn haddii uu ka faa’iideysto awoodda dheeraadka ah ee kooxdaas.

fields.which:
Cabdi wuxuu si guul leh u qanciyay SoCK inay raacaan qorshihiisa, sidaas darteed hadda dhammaan xubnaha SoCK waxay isku dayayaan inay laanta sharwadaha ah ka dhigaan mid ka dheer laanta hadda jirta. Iyada oo la adeegsanayo dhammaan awoodda xisaabeed ee SoCK, Cabdi wuxuu si aad ah uga dheereyn doonaa haddii uu isku dayi lahaa arrintan kaligiis:

Waxaa jira 100 macdane oo daacad ah oo ka tirsan ZooCash, mid walbana wuxuu haystaa 1 THash/s oo ah awood xisaabeed
(taasoo la micno ah in mid walba uu xisaabin karo
10¹² hash ilbiriqsikii),
laanta Cabdi-na waxay ka bilaabataa 20 block oo ka horreeya block-ga ugu dambeeya ee ku jira blockchain-ka weyn.
fields.question_text: Immisa awood xisaabeed (hashing power) ayey SoCK u baahan tahay si ay si guul leh ugu fuliyaan qorshahooda?

options.text: > 1 THash/s
> 20 THash/s
> 50 THash/s
> 100 THash/s
> 2000 THash/s

correct_answer.text: > 100 THash/s

fields.explanation:
Dhererka la filayo ee silsiladda (tirada blocks) waxaa lagu xisaabiyaa:

L = L₀ + v × t

halka:

L₀ = dhererka silsiladda marka la bilaabayo,

v = xawaaraha blocks-ka (block velocity) — tirada blocks ansax ah ee la helayo waqti cayiman gudaheed,

t = waqtiga la qaatay.

Inta uu yahay:
vₛₒꜱₖ > vₘᵢₙₑᵣₛ
— xitaa haddii uu wax yar ka badan yahay —
marka waqtigu kaco, dhererka silsiladda SoCK (Lₛₒꜱₖ) ugu dambayn wuu ka dheerayn doonaa silsiladda macdaneeyeyaasha daacadda ah (Lₘᵢₙₑᵣₛ).

Block velocity waxaa lagu xisaabiyaa:

v = Hashing Power ÷ Tirada hash-ka celcelis ahaan loogu baahan yahay in lagu helo block.

Sababtoo ah labada dhinacba (SoCK iyo kuwa daacadda ah) waxay la kulmayaan celcelis isku mid ah oo hash looga baahan yahay si block loo helo, waxay SoCK u baahan yihiin oo kaliya inay haystaan awood xisaabeed (hashing power) ka badan tan kuwa daacadda ah si ay uga dheereeyaan.

100 macdane oo daacad ah ayaa mid walba haysta 1 THash/s,

Wadarta guud: 100 THash/s

Sidaas darteed, si ay u guuleystaan qorshahooda, SoCK waxay u baahan yihiin hashing power ka badan 100 THash/s — xitaa haddii ay tahay 100.0001 THash/s, taas ayaa ku filan in muddo ka dib ay ka dhaafaan silsiladda daacadda ah.

fields.which: SoCK waxay awood u leedahay inay xisaabiso 125 THash/s, marka la barbardhigo 100 THash/s oo ay haystaan dhammaan macdaneeyeyaasha daacadda ah.
fields.question_text: Haddii laanta SoCK ay ka bilaabato 20 block ka dambaysa marka qorshahoodu bilaabmo, islamarkaana celcelis ahaan ay ku qaadato 60,000 THash in la qodo hal block ansax ah, markaas qiyaastii intee ayay SoCK filan kartaa inay qaadato kahor inta aysan laantooda noqon tan ugu dheer?

options.text: 40 daqiiqo
160 daqiiqo
200 daqiiqo
800 daqiiqo
Laanta SoCK weligeed noqon mayso laanta ugu dheer.

correct_answer.text: 800 daqiiqo

fields.explanation:
Tallaabada 1
Sida lagu sharxay xalka hore, dhererka la filayo ee silsiladda (tirada blocks) waxaa lagu xisaabiyaa:

ini
Copy
Edit
L = L₀ + v × t
Halka xawaaraha blocks lagu xisaabiyo sidan:

mathematica
Copy
Edit
v = Hashing Power / Average Hashes to Find a Block
Xisaabinta labada xawaare:

bash
Copy
Edit
v_SoCK = 125 THash/s ÷ 60,000 THash = 0.0021 blocks/s = 0.125 blocks/min

v_miners = 100 THash/s ÷ 60,000 THash = 0.0017 blocks/s = 0.1 blocks/min
Marka:

Xawaaraha SoCK = 0.125 blocks/min

Xawaaraha macdaneeyeyaasha daacadda ah = 0.1 blocks/min









Tallaabada 2
Waxaan rabnaa inaan helno goorta silsiladda SoCK ay dhaafi doonto silsiladda kale ee tartameysa, taasoo bilaabatay iyadoo 20 blocks ka dheer. Sidaas darteed, waxaan xallinaynaa xilliga t marka labada silsiladood la filayo inay isu dherer noqdaan:

java
Copy
Edit
L_SoCK = L_miners
v_SoCK × t = 20 + v_miners × t
Hadda dib u habeyn:

java
Copy
Edit
v_SoCK × t − v_miners × t = 20
t × (v_SoCK − v_miners) = 20
Tallaabada xigta: ku beddel qiimayaasha:

ini
Copy
Edit
t = 20 / (v_SoCK − v_miners)
t = 20 / (0.125 − 0.1)
t = 20 / 0.025
t = 800 minutes
Natiijo:
SoCK waxay qaadan doontaa qiyaastii 800 daqiiqo si ay silsiladdooda uga dhigaan mid dherer ahaan la mid ah silsiladda daacadda ah.

fields.which:
Kuwaan waa qaar ka mid ah falalka sharwadaha ah ee qof laga yaabo inuu isku dayo:

Si guul leh u abuuro laan dib u noqosho ah (backtracking fork).

Isticmaal createCash() dhowr jeer hal block gudaheed.

Ka hortag in macaamillo gaar ah ay gaaraan silsiladda weyn .

isticmaalka-Labalaab(double-spend) gudaha hal laan gudaheeda.

Isticmaal lacag aysan iyagu lahayn oo ku jirta akoonnada kale.
fields.question_text: Haddii SoCK ay haystaan inta badan awoodda xisaabeed ee shabakadda ZooCash, imisa ka mid ah xeeladaha kor ku xusan ayay si guul leh ugu fuli karaan weerar 51% ah?
fields.explanation:
Weerar 51% ah oo guuleysta wuxuu si wax ku ool ah u ogolaanayaa weeraryahanka inuu doorto laanta noqoneysa tan ugu dheer, laakiin ma siiyo awood uu ku ansaxiyo blocks aan sax ahayn.

Tani waxay ka dhigan tahay in weerar 51% ah uu suurtagal ka dhigi karo in la abuuro laan dib u noqosho ah (sida aan ku aragnay su’aashii hore), ama in la cunaqabateeyo macaamillo gaar ah si aysan ugu darin silsiladda weyn (taasoo lagu gaari karo adigoo mar walba hormarinaya laamaha aan wadin macaamilladaas).

Laakiin weerar 51% ah ma jebin karo xeerarka ansaxnimada block-yada ama cryptography-ga aasaasiga ah ee nidaamka, sidaas darteed ma oggolaan karo weeraryahan inuu beddelo xeerarka ku saabsan createCash() ama waxa looga baahan yahay macaamil si uu ansax u noqdo.

fields.which: Iyadoo la adeegsanayo midkood labadan hab, macdaneeyeyaasha daacadda ah ee raacaya habraacyada caadiga ah ma awoodi doonaan inay ka hortagaan weerarradaas noocan ah.
fields.question_text: Haddii SoCK ay urursadaan inta badan awoodda hash-ka oo ay bilaabaan inay ku dhaqmaan dhaqanadan sharwadaha ah, miyuu beesha macdanta inteeda kale awoodi doonaa inay gartaan in ZooCash la weeraray?

options.text: Maya, midkoodna labadaas nooc ee weerar ah lama ogaan karo.
Cunaqabateynta macaamillada waa la ogaan karaa, laakiin laan dib loogu noqdo (backtracking fork) lama ogaan karo.
Laan dib loogu noqdo (backtracking fork) waa la ogaan karaa, laakiin cunaqabateynta macaamillada lama ogaan karo.
Haa, labadan nooc ee weerar waa sahal in la ogaado:

correct_answer.text: Haa, labadan nooc ee weerar waa sahal in la ogaado:

fields.explanation:
Inkasta oo SoCK ay si guul leh u fulin karaan labadan nooc ee weerarada 51%, haddana waxay si cad uga muuqan doontaa macdaneeyeyaasha daacadda ah (iyo cid kasta oo kale oo la socota buugga xisaabaadka ZooCash) in ZooCash uu ku jiro weerar.

Marka la joogo xaaladda cunaqabateynta macaamillada, macdaneeyeyaasha waxay ogaan doonaan in block-yadoodii ay ku jireen macaamillada la cunaqabateeyay mar walba la iska tuuro oo la beddelo laamo kale.

Marka la joogo xaaladda laan dib loogu noqdo (backtracking fork), macdaneeyeyaasha waxay arki doonaan in laan duug ah oo gaaban ay si lama filaan ah uga dheertahay laantii hore ee ugu weynayd.

Labadan natiijo midna ma aha wax iska dhacaya sababo nasiib ah oo kaliya, taasoo ka dhigaysa in weerarka si sahlan loo garan karo.

fields.which:
Tusaale ahaan, bal qiyaas inaad rabto inaad wax ka iibsato bog internet ah oo aadan horey u adeegsanin, isla markaana kaliya aqbala ZooCash ahaan lacag bixin.

Waxay sheegayaan in ay kuu diri doonaan alaabta aad dalbatay markay helaan macaamil ZooCash ah oo ku saabsan qadarka saxda ah ee Z¢ loo diro akoon gaar ah:
fields.question_text: Waa maxay khasaaraha kugu jira adigoo adeegsanaya payCash() si aad ugu bixiso dalabkaaga xaaladdan?

options.text: Akoonka ay ku tusayaan laga yaabee inuusan ka tirsanayn shirkadda.
Haddii aad si kama’ ah u bixiso lacag ka badan inta loogu talagalay, ma jirto waddo lagu saxo.
Ma jirto waddo aad ku soo ceshan karto lacagtaada haddii ay noqdaan khiyaanoolayaal.
Ma jirto wax dhibaato ah, tani waa hab amaan ah oo wax looga iibsado internetka.

correct_answer.text: Ma jirto waddo aad ku soo ceshan karto lacagtaada haddii ay noqdaan khiyaanoolayaal.

fields.explanation:
Dhibaatada nidaamkan ayaa ah in ay aad u adag tahay in la celiyo macaamil ZooCash ah. Haddii macaamilka uu ku jiro laanta ugu dheer ee blockchain-ka, wuxuu sii ahaanayaa mid ansax ah, waana lama huraan in aad ku kalsoonaato shirkadda in ay alaabta kuu diri doonto marka macaamilka la xaqiijiyo.

Haddii ay been sheegayaan, ma jirto hab aad ZooCash-kaaga ku soo ceshan karto
(ilaa aad fuli karto weerar 51% ah, taasoo ah wax aad u adag).

Haddii ay daacad yihiin, markaas ma jiro wax walaac ah ku saabsan cidda akoonka leh, maadaama aad weli raaceyso tilmaamahooda. Haddii aad si kama’ ah lacag dheeraad ah u bixiso, waxay kugu soo celinayaan faraqa.

fields.which:
Bal qiyaas in la sameeyay laba hawlood oo isku xiran oo la yiraahdo "Dib-u-bixin" delayedPay() iyo "Bixi lacagta" releasePayment() kuwaas oo u shaqeeya sidaan:

Marka la waco:

"Dib-u-bixin" delayedPay(qadarka: diraha → qaataha, saxiixa diraha),
lacagta Z¢ si toos ah looguma dirayo qaataha. Halkii taas laga sameyn lahaa, lacagta waxaa loo diraa "akoon kaydin" oo si gaar ah loogu sameeyo wicitaanka "Dib-u-bixin" delayedPay().

Kadib, marka dambe la waco:

"Bixi lacagta" releasePayment(),
oo ah wicitaan ay saxiixaan labada dhinac — diraha iyo qaataha ee ku lug lahaa wicitaankii hore ee "Dib-u-bixin" delayedPay(),
markaas ayaa Z¢ laga wareejinayaa akoontigii kaydinta loona wareejinayaa qaataha.
fields.question_text: Haddii macmiilku badeecad ku iibsado isagoo adeegsanaya Dib-u-bixin halkii uu ka adeegsan lahaa bixinta tooska ah (payCash), ma noqonayaan miyaa hawlaha Dib-u-bixin / Bixi lacagta kuwo ku qanci kara labada dhinac — macmiilka iyo ganacsadaha?

options.text: Haa, tani waxay ku shaqayn kartaa labadaba — macmiilka iyo ganacsadaha.
Maya, tani ma noqon doonto mid wanaagsan oo ku habboon macaamiisha.
Maya, tani ma noqon doonto mid u fiican ganacsadaha.

correct_answer.text: Maya, tani ma noqon doonto mid u fiican ganacsadaha.

fields.explanation:
Inkasta oo nidaamkan uu ka niyad-jabinayo ganacsatada inay lacag qaataan iyagoon alaabta dirin (maxaa yeelay haddii ay sidaas sameeyaan, macmiilku ma Bixi lacagta, ganacsaduhuna lacag ma helayo), haddana weli waa khatar ku jirta dhinaca ganacsadaha.

Macmiilku wuxuu si fudud uga gaabi karaa Bixi lacagta xitaa kadib marka uu helo badeecadda — lacagta weli way xiran tahay, balse macmiilku laga yaabee inuusan dan ka lahayn, maadaama uu horey u helay badeecaddii iyo lacagtiisii Z¢ oo uu horeyba uga baxay akoonkiisa.

fields.which: Zippy’s Pizzas waxay dammaanad qaadaysaa keenista pizza-ga muddo 1 saac gudahood ah, haddii kale waa bilaash. Si ay u muujiyaan sida ay arrinta uga go’an tahay, waxay aqbalaan lacagta ZooCash iyagoo adeegsanaya timelockPay() oo leh 1 saac oo timeLock ah. Haddii ay pizza-ga waqtigiisa keenaan, macmiilku wuxuu sii daayaa lacagta si uu u helo pizza-ga:
fields.question_text: Maxaa dhaca haddii keenista ay ka badato hal saac?

options.text: Macmiilku wuu kusoo celin karaa lacagta timelock akoonkiisa markii hal saac laga gudbo.
Lacagta si toos ah ayaa loogu sii daayaa akoonka Zippy marka saacadda ay dhammaato.
Lacagta Dib-u-xirnaanta (timelock) waxay ahaan doontaa mid xiran weligeed, waxaana dhici doonta in ZooCash-kaas aan mar dambe la isticmaalin.

correct_answer.text: Macmiilku wuu kusoo celin karaa lacagta timelock akoonkiisa markii hal saac laga gudbo.

fields.explanation:
Xeerarka Dib-u-xirnaanta Bixinta (timelockPay()) waxay sheegayaan in marka mudada dib-u-xirnaanta (timeLock) ay dhamaato, macmiilku uu dib ugu celin karo lacagtiisa akoonkiisa isagoo adeegsanaya saxiixiisa oo keliya. Tani waxay ka dhigan tahay in macmiilka Zippy’s Pizzas oo isticmaalaya timelockPay() oo leh 1 saac timeLock, uu heli karo ZooCash-kiisa mar haddii saacaddaasi dhammaato.

Si kastaba ha ahaatee, haddii aad si qoto dheer u fahanto algorithm-yada ama sharciyada, waxaad ogaan kartaa in arrintani aysan si toos ah uga dhignayn pizza bilaash ah haddii keenista ay ka badan tahay 1 saac.

Qofka keenista ka socda Zippy’s ma lagu qasbi karo inuu siiyo macmiilka pizza-ga haddii lacagtii dib loogu celiyay akoonkii macmiilka.

fields.which:
Si kastaba ha ahaatee, Amazoo waxay dooran kartaa inaysan isla markiiba furin lacagtaas. Haddii ay sugaan oo uu macmiilku u baahdo 10 MB kale oo xog ah, macmiilku wuxuu heli doonaa adeegga isagoo saxiixaya wicitaan Bixi lacagta (releasePayment()) oo u dira Amazoo Mobile 0.02 Z¢
(laga soo jaray isla lacagtii waqtiga-xirnayd ee ahayd 1 Z¢).
fields.question_text: Marka la gaaro heerkan (iyadoo aan wax saxiix dheeraad ah laga helin macmiilka), imisa Z¢ ayay Amazoo Mobile ka urursan kartaa macmiilkan?
fields.explanation:
Maadaama saxiix kasta oo Bixi lacagta (releasePayment) uu la xiriirayo isla lacagtii lagu xiray timelock, hal jeer oo kaliya ayaa la furi karaa. Haddii Amazoo Mobile ay furto bixinta ugu horreysa oo ah 0.01Z¢, bixinta labaad waxay noqonaysaa mid aan ansax ahayn maadaama lacagtaasi horey loo wareejiyay.

Sidaas darteed, Amazoo Mobile waxay awoodi doonaan inay furaan hal ka mid ah bixinnadaas (inta badan midda ay lacagta ugu badan ka helayaan — kiiskan waa 0.02Z¢).

Waxay sidoo kale dan ugu jirtaa in ay lacagta furaan oo aysan ka tagin iyadoo xiran, sababtoo ah haddii waqtigii timelock uu dhaafo, macmiilka ayaa dib u heli kara dhammaan Z¢-giisa.

fields.which:
Bilowgii, ICO-yadu waxay si aan la xakameynin ugu oggolaayeen shirkado inay lacag urursadaan. Sababtaas awgeed, qaar badan oo ka mid ah waxay noqdeen khiyaanooyin, taasoo sumcad xumo u keentay ICO-yada. Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaa jiray sheekooyin guul leh — Ethereum waa lacagta labaad ee ugu weyn cryptocurrency-ga, waxayna ka bilaabatay ICO ku saleysan Bitcoin (taasoo ah tan ugu weyn).

Ma doonayno inaan ka dhiibanno aragti ah in ka qeybgalka ICO ay tahay mid habboon ama maya, ee waxaan kaliya dooneynaa inaan sheegno in ICO-yadu ay suuragal ku noqdeen smart contracts.
fields.question_text: Si uu u shaqeeyo si la mid ah IPO dhaqameed (laakiin halkii saamiyo laga siin lahaa uu bixiyo tokens), heshiiska caqliga leh ee ICO-gu wuxuu u baahan lahaa inuu si toos ah ugu diro tokens akoonnada diraya Z¢. Waa maxay shaqooyin kale oo uu u baahan lahaa?

options.text: Waxay beddeli lahayd qiimaha tokens-ka inta lagu jiro muddada ICO-ga.
Waxay joojin lahayd aqbalidda lacagaha marka tiro cayiman oo tokens ah la qaybiyo.
Waxay u oggolaan lahayd garsoore inuu beddelo heshiiska caqliga leh (smart contract) inta lagu jiro muddada ICO-ga.
Waxay isu beddeli lahayd suuq lagu kala iibsado laguna kala gato tokens marka ICO-gu dhamaado.

correct_answer.text: Waxay joojin lahayd aqbalidda lacagaha marka tiro cayiman oo tokens ah la qaybiyo.

fields.explanation:
In IPO, tiro go’an oo saamiyo ah ayaa lagu iibiyaa qiimo go’an. Si loola mid noqdo hab-dhaqankan, heshiiska caqliga leh ee ICO-ga waa inuu si toos ah ugu diro tokens (oo u shaqaynaya sidii “saamiyo”) akoonnada u dira ZooCash, iyadoo la raacayo is-weydaarsi go’an, laakiin uu joojiyaa aqbalidda lacagaha marka tirada la cayimay ee tokens-ka la qaybiyo.

In kasta oo astaamo kale ay faa’iido yeelan karaan (sida in la dhimo qiimaha tokens-ka maal-gashadayaasha hore) oo laga isticmaalay ICO-yadii dhabta ahaa, haddana arrimahan ma matalaan waxa ka dhaca IPO.
